trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with UserVoice | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with UserVoice | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use UserVoice with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use UserVoice with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with UserVoice
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with UserVoice

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=524477).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=524477).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and UserVoice.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and UserVoice.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A UserVoice tenant
trans-unit.target: A UserVoice tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to UserVoice will be able to single sign into the application at your UserVoice company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to UserVoice will be able to single sign into the application at your UserVoice company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for UserVoice
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for UserVoice

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for UserVoice
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for UserVoice

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for UserVoice.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for UserVoice.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for UserVoice, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for UserVoice, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **UserVoice**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **UserVoice**.

trans-unit.source: Application gallery
trans-unit.target: Application gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **UserVoice**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **UserVoice**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: UserVoice
trans-unit.target: UserVoice

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to UserVoice with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to UserVoice with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on for UserVoice requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on for UserVoice requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI).
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI).

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **UserVoice** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **UserVoice** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to UserVoice** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to UserVoice** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **UserVoice Sign In URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://\<tenant-name\>.UserVoice.com*", and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **UserVoice Sign In URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://\<tenant-name\>.UserVoice.com*", and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at UserVoice** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally as **c:\\UserVoice.cer**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at UserVoice** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate file locally as **c:\\UserVoice.cer**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your UserVoice company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your UserVoice company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the toolbar on the top, click Settings, and then select Web portal from the menu.
trans-unit.target: In the toolbar on the top, click Settings, and then select Web portal from the menu.

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: On the **Web portal** tab, in the **User authentication** section, click **Edit** to open the **Edit User Authentication** dialog page
trans-unit.target: On the **Web portal** tab, in the **User authentication** section, click **Edit** to open the **Edit User Authentication** dialog page

trans-unit.source: Web portal
trans-unit.target: Web portal

trans-unit.source: On the **Edit User Authentication** dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Edit User Authentication** dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Edit user authentication
trans-unit.target: Edit user authentication

trans-unit.source: Click **Single Sign-On (SSO)**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Single Sign-On (SSO)**.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at UserVoice** dialog page, copy the **Remote Login URL** value, and then paste it into the **SSO Remote Sign-In** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at UserVoice** dialog page, copy the **Remote Login URL** value, and then paste it into the **SSO Remote Sign-In** textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at UserVoice** dialog page, copy the **Remote Logout URL** value, and then paste it into the **SSO Remote Sign-Out textbox**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at UserVoice** dialog page, copy the **Remote Logout URL** value, and then paste it into the **SSO Remote Sign-Out textbox**.

trans-unit.source: Copy the **Thumbprint** value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the **Current certificate SHA1 fingerprint** textbox.
trans-unit.target: Copy the **Thumbprint** value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the **Current certificate SHA1 fingerprint** textbox.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] For more details, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] For more details, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)

trans-unit.source: Click **Save authentication settings**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save authentication settings**.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into UserVoice, they must be provisioned into UserVoice.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into UserVoice, they must be provisioned into UserVoice.

trans-unit.source: In the case of UserVoice, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of UserVoice, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Log in to your **UserVoice** tenant.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your **UserVoice** tenant.

trans-unit.source: Go to **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: Click **General**.
trans-unit.target: Click **General**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Agents and permissions**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Agents and permissions**.

trans-unit.source: Agents and permissions
trans-unit.target: Agents and permissions

trans-unit.source: Click **Add admins**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add admins**.

trans-unit.source: Add admins
trans-unit.target: Add admins

trans-unit.source: On the **Invite admins** dialog, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Invite admins** dialog, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Invite admins
trans-unit.target: Invite admins

trans-unit.source: In the Emails texbox, type the email address of the account you want to provision, and then click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: In the Emails texbox, type the email address of the account you want to provision, and then click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Invite**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Invite**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other UserVoice user account creation tools or APIs provided by UserVoice to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other UserVoice user account creation tools or APIs provided by UserVoice to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to UserVoice, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to UserVoice, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **UserVoice **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **UserVoice **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign users
trans-unit.target: Assign users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
